>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>Liono clenches his teeth tighter as Motormaster's hands tighten
>around his neck. He draws back his sword and stabs again, but the
>lack of mechfluid to his head was starting to make him dizzy.
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>Seeing that his brother is in trouble, Dark sets the LA2 on autopilot
>and edjects, flying toward Motormaster. He fires two blasma blasts at
>the bot.

OOC: Im asuming that you meant by dizzy is that his aim wont be so good, If
i'm wrong tell me and I will correct this.

BIC:
Motormaster delights in the sight of his enemy's strugle in his iron grasp.
Then with surprise on his face, he feels the edge of the sword nick him,
"you're finished" he cruely cackles, then his dark smile is replaced by a
look of pain, as his back starts to sizzle. "Ohh, okkhh" He is forced to
loosen one of his hands. Then in anger he drives his free hand's fist into
the face of Liono, his face once again in a scowl.
